data.title: Reverse the given sentence
data.statement: You're given a sentence 's'. Reverse it without reversing its words.

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn: you live in a large trailer park and you have four young children
testCases.testOut: children young four have you and park trailer large a in live you

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: The price range is from $7.99 for extra-small to $14.98 for extra-large.
testCases.testOut: extra-large. for $14.98 to extra-small for $7.99 from is range price The

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn: Oh, how I'd love to go!
testCases.testOut: go! to love I'd how Oh,

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: The production seriation performance for the numerous related small and medium-sized enterprises the industrial colony which forms regarding an extra large type end product business.
testCases.testOut: business. product end type large extra an regarding forms which colony industrial the enterprises medium-sized and small related numerous the for performance seriation production The

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: Reaching the large house near the Horse Guards' barracks, in which Anatole lived, Pierre entered the lighted porch, ascended the stairs, and went in at the open door.
testCases.testOut: door. open the at in went and stairs, the ascended porch, lighted the entered Pierre lived, Anatole which in barracks, Guards' Horse the near house large the Reaching

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: That's what interests me about this story (which may or may not be purely true): What Simonides did—recalling the names and locations of everyone at a large banquet—is described as entirely possible and an enviable, practical skill.
testCases.testOut: skill. practical enviable, an and possible entirely as described banquet—is large a at everyone of locations and names the did—recalling Simonides What true): purely be not may or may (which story this about me interests what That's

data.outputDescription: output the result as mentioned in the description.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You're given a sentence 's'. Reverse it without reversing its words.
Input
Input string 's'.
Output
output the result as mentioned in the description.
Constraints
1 <= length(s) <= 1000
Example
Input
Hello there!!
Output
there!! Hello
